course_description: First-year MRL students are required to enroll in the MRL Advising course. The course assists entering students with orientation to Emory, Candler and in exploring vocational options for the degree.
sections: Class Nbr: 6037, Section #: 1, Type: DIS, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 12-12:50p, Instructor: D. Womack, Status: Open
